Slaanesh (Age of Sigmar) [960pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 1,000 (Chaos - Slaanesh) [960pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [430pts]

      • Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot [220pts]

        Selections: Bladebringer's Flensing Whip, Daemonettes' Piercing Claws, General, Steed's Poisoned Tongue

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, EXALTED CHARIOTS, HERO, SLAANESH, BLADEBRINGER, WIZARD, Leader, General

        Unit: Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot, Unit Abilities: Excess of Blades, Pungent Soulscent, Weapon: Bladebringer's Flensing Whip, Daemonettes' Piercing Claws, Steed's Poisoned Tongue


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot 10"10104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Excess of Blades Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model finishes a charge move. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Pungent Soulscent At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, for each 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

      • The Contorted Epitome [210pts]

        Selections: 1. Lash of Slaanesh, Coiled Tentacles, Ravaging Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, WIZARD, Leader

        Magic: Magic, Spell: Lash of Slaanesh, Overwhelming Acquiescence, Unit: The Contorted Epitome, Unit Abilities: Gift of Power, Horrible Fascination, Swallow Energy, Weapon: Coiled Tentacles, Ravaging Claws


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Magic 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, and Overwhelming Acquiescence
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Lash of Slaanesh 5Pick 1 point on the battlefield within 12" of the caster that is visible to them, and draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of the caster's base. Roll a dice for each enemy model passed across by this line. On a 4+ that model's unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Overwhelming Acquiescence 7You can pick up to D3 enemy units within 24" of the caster that are visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target those units until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        The Contorted Epitome 12"7105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Gift of Power You can re-roll casting, unbinding and dispelling rolls for this model.
        Horrible Fascination At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly models with this ability. On a 4+, that unit fights at the end of that combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight with in that combat phase.

        If a unit that is affected by this ability is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Swallow Energy Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 2+, that mortal wound is negated.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Coiled Tentacles Melee3"23+4+-22
        Ravaging Claws Melee1"93+4+-11

    • Other [310pts]

      • Fiends [190pts]

        Selections: 3 Fiends [190pts], Barbed Stinger, Deadly Pincers

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, FIENDS, SLAANESH, Other

        Unit: Fiends, Unit Abilities: Crushing Grip, Deadly Venom, Disruptive Song, Soporific Musk, Weapon: Barbed Stinger, Deadly Pincers


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Fiends 12"4105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Crushing Grip If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with Deadly Pincers is 6, the Deadly Pincers have a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of 1 for that attack.
        Deadly Venom If the target of an attack made with a Barbed Stinger has a Wounds characteristic of 1, the Barbed Stinger has a Damage characteristic of 1 for that attack; if the target of an attack made with a Barbed Stinger has a Wounds characteristic of 2-3, the Barbed Stinger has a Damage characteristic of D3 for that attack; if the target of an attack made with a Barbed Stinger has a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more, the Barbed Stinger has a Damage characteristic of D6 for that attack.
        Disruptive Song Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS while they are within 12" of one or more models with this ability.
        Soporific Musk Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit. In addition, while this unit has 4 or more models, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Barbed Stinger Melee2"13+3+-1*
        Deadly Pincers Melee1"43+3+-11

      • Seekers [120pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SEEKERS, SLAANESH, Other

        Unit: Seekers, Unit Abilities: Icon and Standard Bearers, Quicksilver Speed, Soul Hunters, Weapon: Piercing Claws, Poisoned Tongue


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Seekers 14"2105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Banner Bearer, and 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Icon Bearer.
        Quicksilver Speed You can roll 2D6 instead of D6 when you make a run roll for this unit. In addition, this unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Soul Hunters If any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this unit’s attacks in the combat phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons in the next combat phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Slaanesh

          Selections: Host of Syll'esske

          Battle Trait: Common Purpose, Deadly Symbiosis, Euphoric Killers, Feast of Depravities, Hosts of Slaanesh, Locus of Diversion, Syll'esskan Host, Depravity Point Table: (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets, (02) 30 Daemonettes, (03) 3 Seeker Chariots, (04) 20 Daemonettes, (05) 1 Contorted Epitome, (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot, (07) 3 Fiends, (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer, (09) 1 Exalted Chariot, (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh, (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot, (12) 1 Hellflayer, (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh, (14) 1 Seeker Chariot, (15) 5 Seekers, (16) 10 Daemonettes


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Common Purpose At the start of the battle, if the number of MORTAL units in a Syll’Esskan Host army is exactly equal to the number of DAEMON units, you receive D3 extra command points. If the total number of units in the army is more than 12, and the number of MORTAL units in a Syll’Esskan Host army is exactly equal to the number of DAEMON units, you receive D6 extra command points instead of D3 extra points. Syll’Esske counts as 2 units, 1 MORTAL and 1 DAEMON, for the purposes of this rule.
        Deadly Symbiosis When you receive depravity points because a friendly SLAANESH HERO has inflicted a wound or mortal wound, or has suffered a wound or mortal wound, you receive 2 depravity points instead of 1 if that SLAANESH HERO is within 12" of SYLL’ESSKE.
        Euphoric Killers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a CHAOS SLAANESH model is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. If the attacking model’s unit has 20 or more models, its attacks inflict 3 hits on an unmodified hit roll of 6 instead.
        Feast of Depravities You can summon units of SLAANESH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough depravity points (DPs). Each time a wound or mortal wound is inflicted on an enemy model by an attack made by a friendly SLAANESH HERO or a spell cast by a friendly SLAANESH HERO, and that enemy model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point. In addition, every time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly SLAANESH HERO and not negated, and that friendly model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point.

        If you have any depravity points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the list below to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of depravity points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough depravity points to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly SLAANESH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of depravity points you have immediately after it has been set up.
        Hosts of Slaanesh After you have chosen the Slaanesh allegiance for your army, you must also choose a Host of Slaanesh keyword for your army. You can choose for your army to be an INVADERS HOST, a PRETENDERS HOST, or a GODSEEKERS HOST. All units in your army gain the keyword of the host that you have chosen. All units with that keyword benefit from the host’s allegiance abilities, which are presented on the following pages, in addition to the allegiance abilities they have for being from a Slaanesh army.
        Locus of Diversion At the end of the charge phase, each friendly HEDONITE HERO that is within 6" of an enemy unit can create a locus of diversion. If they do so, pick 1 enemy unit that is within 6" of that HEDONITE HERO and roll a dice, adding 2 if that HEDONITE HERO is a GREATER DAEMON. On a 5+, that enemy unit fights at the end of the following combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight in that combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same charge phase (whether the roll is successful or not).

        If a unit that is affected by this battle trait is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the following combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Syll'esskan Host A Syll’Esskan Host can include only the following warscroll battalions: The Vengeful Alliance, Epicurean Revellers, Seeker Cavalcade, Devout Supplicants, Vengeful Throng and Daemonsteel Contingent. The Vengeful Alliance, Devout Supplicants, Vengeful Throng and Daemonsteel Contingent warscroll battalions can only be used in an army that is a Syll’Esskan Host.
        Depravity Point Table Cost
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 45
        (02) 30 Daemonettes 40
        (03) 3 Seeker Chariots 35
        (04) 20 Daemonettes 28
        (05) 1 Contorted Epitome 23
        (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 23
        (07) 3 Fiends 23
        (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer 20
        (09) 1 Exalted Chariot 20
        (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh 17
        (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot 17
        (12) 1 Hellflayer 17
        (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh 15
        (14) 1 Seeker Chariot 15
        (15) 5 Seekers 15
        (16) 10 Daemonettes 14

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1000 Points - Vanguard

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.
